title: Before it all kicks off
description: What to prepare before back to school? As an ECT 1 there's a sense of peace in my own ignorance. Even with a headstart of 5 weeks before summer I've not done this before and I don't know many of the students. Seating plans are going to be guesses, and while I can (and need to) do some planning I won't know what will work for each class until I start teaching them.
